name: Bobisbug.GitHub.io
body:
## Privacy Policy

Bob is Bug, Android and IOS Game Privacy Statement (the "Privacy Statement") describes how Bob is Bug treats personal information when you download and install, including information collected while you play the game. By installing and playing Bob is Bug, you are accepting the practices described in the Privacy Statement, as well as the following privacy practices that are specific to Bob is Bug:

	Bob is Bug;
		Does not collect nor share your identity,
		Does not access your other apps,
		Does not send you cookies,
		Does not track you in any way,
		Has nothing to do with any private information at all.


Our game is only requies access to disk to locally save the highest score. We never collect any information from your device, we never receive any data or any personal identifying information from you.

Our game is fully respectful to privacy of you and your children. We don't use your children's any personal data. We never store any data on or servers as we don't even have any server or system for it. Our game is simply running on your device locally, and there is no server or data communication with us.

By installing and playing "Bob is Bug" game, we can guarantee you that our game has no relation to users privacy, we are never interested in private identifying data of users or gamers.

Above desribed policy is also our principles for privacy and our respect to privacy and full privacy protection principle will not change.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
